channel.title: Wonder spring the new noob coder ^^
channel.description:
Can sombody tell me how to make a donator staff?
I use search button and i find lots of people that are asking this question and they got an answer like this : You need to work on the client and server sides.... (thats all i found ... )
So if sombody can tell me what i need to modify (files , codes ... ) to make a donator staff in game with crown , i will really appreciate that :D
Thanks

item.title: Wonder spring the new noob coder ^^
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

This is more client related then server, so I guess I’ll move it.

Read full topic

item.description:

The chat methods in the client to display the crowns and all you have to do server-side is load the donators list.
